Kata Menpora dalam Sambutannya di KLB PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 12:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga (Menpora), Zainudin Amali menghadiri Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI yang berlangsung di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Dia hadir bersama Ketua Komite Olahraga Nasional Indonesia (KONI) Marciano Norman, dan Ketua Komite Olimpade Indonesia (KOI) Raja Sapta Oktohari.
Dalam sambutannya, Zainudin menyampaikan beberapa pesan untuk PSSI. Satu di antaranya adalah penegasan bahwa pemerintah tidak akan ikut campur atau mengintervensi.
"Pemerintah mengucapkan terima kasih kepada PSSI yang telah menyelenggarakan Kongres Luar Biasa ini. Pemerintah tak mau ikut campur dalam cabor-cabor, termasuk PSSI. Tapi kami memonitor dan mengawasi," ujar Zainudin.
"Kalau ada masalah di cabang olahraga silahkan selesaikan sendiri, karena kalau toh mereka tidak mampu menyelesaikan ada dari KOI dan KONI, dan kalau toh juga sudah tidak bisa baru ke pemerintah. Sekarang ini kami akan membalik, kalau dulu kan apa-apa langsung ke pemerintah, gak mampir ke KONI, gak mampir ke KOI, jadi seolah-olah tidak ada KONI tidak ada KOI."
"Dan yang gak enaknya yang memaksa pemerintah masuk intevensi. Nah kalau seperti PSSI ini mereka punya aturan, mereka punya statuta, mereka punya induk internasionalnya, begitu kita masuk nanti campur tangan dan bisa di bens kembali kita. Itu yang kami tidak mau, saya tidak mau, pemerintah tidak mau," tegasnya.

Said Menpora in his remarks at KLSI PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 12:55 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Minister of Youth and Sports (Menpora), Zainudin Amali attended PSSI Extraordinary Congress (KLB) which took place at the Shangri-La Hotel, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019). He was present with Chairman of the Indonesian National Sports Committee (KONI) Marciano Norman, and Chair of the Indonesian Olympic Committee (KOI) Raja Sapta Oktohari.
In his remarks, Zainudin conveyed several messages for PSSI. One of them is the assertion that the government will not interfere or intervene.
"The government would like to thank PSSI for organizing this Extraordinary Congress. The government does not want to interfere in sports, including PSSI. But we monitor and supervise," said Zainudin.
"If there is a problem in the sports branch, please solve it yourself, because if they are not able to solve anything from the KOI and KONI, and if they can't be new to the government anyway. Now we will reverse, if in the past it was nothing directly to the government. , don't stop by KONI, don't stop by KOI, so it's as if there's no KONI, no KOI. "
"And what's not good is that it forces the government into intervention. Now if like PSSI they have rules, they have a statute, they have an international parent, as soon as we get in, we can intervene and we can correct it. That's what we don't want, I don't want it, the government doesn't want it, "he stressed.
